name: Tower-Defense-Royale
description:
How to play:

Your mana (purple bar) automatically fills over time. When you have enough mana, you can summon characters to the battlefield. Click on a character's button to summon them, then click on the courtyard on the lower half of the battlefield to place your summoned character. The character will move towards enemies or the enemy's towers and attempt to destroy them. Destroying the center tower immediately ends the game. You can also win by destroying any of your enemy's towers when the game enters the "sudden death overtime" phase, which occurs after 90 seconds of regular play.

Good Luck!
